body_html: This is likely because new streams are created with CudaStreamNonBlocking https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/cuda/Stream.cpp#L18, and as @yongjik noted D2H copy happens in the default stream that does not synchronize with the non-blocking stream. Looks like a bug.
